response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact on your operations, I propose a special introductory price of $11,000 for you. This is a significant discount from the original value of $12,000, aimed at ensuring you receive the best possible deal while maximizing the benefits for your company. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 11000}
